strong_attack.name: Strong Attack
strong_attack.description: A powerful attack that deals double damage but consumes stamina.

shield_block.name: Shield Block
shield_block.description: Block an enemy's attack, reducing incoming damage by 50%.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurl a ball of fire at an enemy, dealing magic-based damage.

healing_touch.name: Healing Touch
healing_touch.description: A soothing touch that restores 20 health points.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: Gradually restore 5 health points at the end of every turn.

power_strike.name: Power Strike
power_strike.description: A heavy strike that deals 1.5x damage and stuns the enemy.

magic_shield.name: Magic Shield
magic_shield.description: Create a barrier that absorbs 30 damage for 3 turns.

berserk_rage.name: Berserk Rage
berserk_rage.description: Enter a frenzied state, increasing damage by 50% for 2 turns but reducing defense.

quick_heal.name: Quick Heal
quick_heal.description: Restore 10 health instantly at the cost of stamina.

arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
arcane_blast.description: Unleash a blast of arcane energy, damaging all nearby enemies.
